message: I propose a fair 90/10 split. I'm sure we can find a better solution than that, but this is a good starting point!
You're off to a high offer, I'm expecting a better deal from you. This is my counteroffer.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to take a 60/40 split, but I'm not going lower.  It's your turn to decide if we can end this game or keep going.
I'm starting to think we're not on the same page. This is a 50/50 split, let's see if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
